Ｒ方面作戦の拠点基地となる\nラバウルに艦隊を進出せよ。\n敵潜水艦、空襲などへ: Deploy the fleet to Rabaul, which will be the base for operations in the R-Area. Be on the lookout for enemy submarines and air raids. Fleet, weigh anchor!
ラバウルより進発、ショート\nランド及びレカタ方面に水上\n機基地を設営すべく輸: Depart from Rabaul and conduct transport operations to establish seaplane bases in the Shortland and Lekata areas! Maintain heightened vigilance!
死闘！\n東部ニューギニア方面護衛隊:
Fierce Battle! Escort Force of
Eastern New Guinea Area
ビスマルク海を越えてラエへ\n増援輸送作戦を実施せよ！\n戦局により、敵基地航空: Conduct reinforcement transports across the Bismarck Sea to Lae! Depending on the state of the battle, a combined fleet may be deployed to restrain the enemy land-based air force!
南西諸島への本格侵攻を開始\nした敵を、我が第二艦隊主力\nによって迎撃する！作: The enemy has launched a full-scale invasion of the Nansei Islands. We will intercept it with the main force of our Second Fleet! Conduct a forward sweep ahead of the operation!
血戦！異聞坊ノ岬沖海戦:
War to the Knife! Curious
Tale of Operation Ten-Go
いよいよ決戦！大和を中核と\nした、我が第二艦隊の精鋭が\n沖縄救援に突入する！: Finally, the decisive battle! The elite of The Second Fleet, with Yamato at its core, will rush to the rescue of Okinawa! Coordination between fleets and aircraft will also be important!
R方面防備部隊、敵艦隊を発見せり！\n合戦用意！ 全艦、突撃せよッ！:
R-Area Defence Force, enemy fleet in sight!
Prepare for battle! All ships, charge!
ラバウル外郭北部、哨戒完了！:
Northern part of outer Rabaul,
patrol complete!
ラバウル外郭西部、哨戒完了！:
Western part of outer Rabaul,
patrol complete!
R方面部隊、増援輸送部隊、発進！:
R-Area Unit, reinforcement
transport unit, launch!
これよりラエ沖に突入する！\n上空監視！ 対空警戒を厳とせよ！:
We are now entering the waters off Lae!
Eyes overhead! Maintain strict
     anti-aircraft vigilance!
上空敵機触接あり。対空警戒を厳に！:
Enemy aircraft in contact overhead.
Keep a strict anti-aircraft vigilance!
左舷にダンピール海峡！警戒を厳に！: Dampier Strait to port! Hold your fire!
これより豊後水道。対潜警戒を厳に！:
From here on, this is the Bungo Channel.
Maintain strict anti-submarine alert!
作戦予定航路、前路掃蕩を完了せり！:
Planned route of operations,
forward sweep complete!
敵機に気をつけろ！ 対空警戒も厳とせよ！:
Watch out for enemy aircraft!
Stay on anti-aircraft alert!
艦隊、大隅海峡を抜ける！\nこれより南西諸島方面へ向かう！:
The fleet is now exiting the Osumi Strait!
We are now heading to the Nansei Islands!
艦隊、徳山沖より出撃す！: The fleet is sailing from Tokuyama!
偽装航路、終了。これより変針、\n第二艦隊1YBは、沖縄を目指す！:
Deceptive route over. Now changing course!
The Second Fleet, 1YB, is now heading
     towards Okinawa!
台湾方面の友軍との連絡を試みる！\n対潜対空、対水上警戒を厳とせよ！:
Attempting to contact friendly forces in the
Taiwan area! Maintain strict anti-submarine,
     anti-air and anti-water vigilance!
敵編隊を発見！\n対空戦闘、用意ッ！:
Enemy formation detected!
Prepare for anti-air combat!
第二艦隊1YBは、これより沖縄に突入す！\n各艦、対潜警戒も厳とせよ！:
The Second Fleet, 1YB, will now enter
Okinawa! All ships, maintain strict
     anti-submarine alert!
艦隊は台北沖に到達。台湾方面に集結中の\n友軍艦隊との連絡、作戦連携に成功せり！:
Our fleet has reached the coast of Taipei.
We've successfully established coordination
     with the friendly fleet in the Taiwan area!
連合救援艦隊、那覇への逆上陸に成功、\n増援及び救援物資の揚陸に成功せり！:
The Combined Rescue Fleet has made a
successful counter-landing at Naha, and has
     successfully landed reinforcement supplies.
